languages.text: "Если вы когда-нибудь захотите узнать, что волнует и тревожит вашу команду, о чем ваши подданные перешептываются по локальным сетям после смены и о чем трезвонят их лидеры по коротковолновым вокс-передатчикам, просто придите ко мне — и я утолю ваше любопытство".

"If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."
languages.original_text: "Если вы когда-нибудь захотите узнать, что волнует и тревожит вашу команду, о чем ваши подданные перешептываются по локальным сетям после смены и о чем трезвонят их лидеры по коротковолновым вокс-передатчикам, просто придите ко мне — и я утолю ваше любопытство".

traits.locale_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their shifts and what their leaders are clamoring about over shortwave vox transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

"If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harboring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their shifts, and what their leaders are clamoring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

"If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harboring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their shifts, and what their leaders are clamoring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

"If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

languages.text: «Si alguna vez quiere conocer las preocupaciones y los problemas de su tripulación o lo que susurran sus súbditos en las redes locales entre turno y turno, así como lo que sus líderes proclaman en transmisiones de voco de onda corta, pregúnteme. Saciaré su curiosidad con mucho gusto».
languages.original_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguna vez quiere conocer las preocupaciones y los problemas de su tripulación o lo que susurran sus súbditos en las redes locales entre turno y turno, así como lo que sus líderes proclaman en transmisiones de voco de onda corta, pregúnteme. Saciaré su curiosidad con mucho gusto».

languages.text: “如果您想知道您的船员有着怎样的疑虑与忧心，想知道您的臣民在工作结束之后，会当地网络中悄悄地说些什么，或是他们的指挥官都会通过短波音阵系统说些什么，只要来找我就好。我可以满足您的好奇心。”
languages.original_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: “如果您想知道您的船员有着怎样的疑虑与忧心，想知道您的臣民在下班后，会当地网络中悄悄地说些什么，或是他们的指挥官都会通过短波音阵系统说些什么，只要来找我就好。我可以满足您的好奇心。”

languages.text: 「クルーが抱えている心配事や悩み、見張り後にローカルネットワークで漏らされるヒソヒソ話、そしてリーダーが短波ヴォクス通信で声を荒げる内容を知りたいときは、私を聞きに来てください…その好奇心を満たして差し上げますよ」
languages.original_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: 「クルーが抱えている心配事や悩み、見張り後にローカルネットワークで漏らされるヒソヒソ話、そしてリーダーが短波ヴォクス通信で声を荒げる内容を知りたいときは、私を聞きに来てください…その好奇心を満たして差し上げますよ」

languages.text: "Falls Ihr jemals wissen wollt, was Eure Crew beschäftigt und beunruhigt, was Eure Untertanen in lokalen Netzwerken nach ihrer Wache flüstern und was ihre Anführer über Kurzwellen-Voxübertragungen von sich geben, besucht mich einfach – ich werde Eure Neugier befriedigen."
languages.original_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr jemals wissen wollt, was Eure Crew beschäftigt und beunruhigt, was Eure Untertanen in lokalen Netzwerken nach ihrer Schicht flüstern und was ihre Anführer über Kurzwellen-Voxübertragungen von sich geben, besucht mich einfach – ich werde Eure Neugier befriedigen."

languages.text: « Si vous souhaitez connaître les inquiétudes et les préoccupations de votre équipage, savoir de quoi vos sujets discutent dans leurs réseaux locaux après le quart ou ce dont leurs chefs parlent sur les transmissions à ondes courtes, venez me voir. Je ne manquerai pas de satisfaire votre curiosité. »
languages.original_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous souhaitez connaître les inquiétudes et les préoccupations de votre équipage, savoir de quoi vos sujets discutent dans leurs réseaux locaux après le travail ou ce dont leurs chefs parlent sur les transmissions à ondes courtes, venez me voir. Je ne manquerai pas de satisfaire votre curiosité. »

languages.text: "Mürettebatınızın beslediği kaygıları, akıllarını kurcalayan şeyleri, nöbetleri bittikten sonra yerel ağlarında hangi konularda fısıldaştıklarını ve liderlerinin kısa dalga voks iletilerinde hangi konularda yaygara kopardığını öğrenmek isterseniz gelip beni görmeniz yeterli. Merakınızı gidermekten şeref duyarım."
languages.original_text: "If you ever want to know what worries and concerns your crew are harbouring, what your subjects are whispering about in local networks after their watches, and what their leaders are clamouring about over shortwave vox-transmissions, just come and see me — I will satisfy your curiosity."

traits.locale_text: "Mürettebatınızın beslediği kaygıları, akıllarını kurcalayan şeyleri, nöbetleri bittikten sonra yerel ağlarında hangi konularda fısıldaştıklarını ve liderlerinin kısa dalga voks iletilerinde hangi konularda yaygara kopardığını öğrenmek isterseniz gelip beni görmeniz yeterli. Merakınızı gidermekten şeref duyarım."
